Package bg.tu_varna.f22621629.models

Class ImagePPM

java.lang.Object
bg.tu_varna.f22621629.models.Image
bg.tu_varna.f22621629.models.ImagePPM
public class ImagePPM extends Image
Represents a PPM format image, a subclass of the Image class. Provides specific implementation for PPM image format.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ImagePPM(Pixel[][] pixels, int[] sizes, String imageName, String format, int maxColorValue)
    Constructs an ImagePPM object with specified pixel data, size, image name, format ("P3"), and maximum color value.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getFormat()
    Returns the format of the PPM image, which is always "P3".
    int
    getMaxColorValue()
    Returns the maximum color value allowed in the PPM image.
    int
    getMaxGrayValue()
    Returns the maximum gray value allowed in the PPM image, which is 255.

  • Constructor Details

    • ImagePPM

      public ImagePPM(Pixel[][] pixels, int[] sizes, String imageName, String format, int maxColorValue)
      Constructs an ImagePPM object with specified pixel data, size, image name, format ("P3"), and maximum color value.
      Parameters:
      pixels - The 2D array of Pixel objects representing the PPM image.
      sizes - The array containing width and height of the PPM image.
      imageName - The name of the PPM image file.
      format - The format of the PPM image ("P3").
      maxColorValue - The maximum color value (typically 255) allowed in the PPM image.

  • Method Details

    • getMaxColorValue

      public int getMaxColorValue()
      Returns the maximum color value allowed in the PPM image.
      Returns:
      The maximum color value (typically 255) allowed in the PPM image.

    • getFormat

      public String getFormat()
      Returns the format of the PPM image, which is always "P3".
      Overrides:
      getFormat in class Image
      Returns:
      The format of the PPM image ("P3").

    • getMaxGrayValue

      public int getMaxGrayValue()
      Returns the maximum gray value allowed in the PPM image, which is 255. This method is specific to PPM images.
      Returns:
      The maximum gray value (255) allowed in the PPM image.
